channel.title: Basic miner?
channel.description:
Well, i'm pretty new to scripting with scar, was wondering if anyone can give me a basic script, which will mine a invi of ores, then just drop them. So i actually have a clue how to start script, instead of doing one from scratch and get lost >.<...
Can anyone supply me with a simple one? Thanks.
